name: Minecraft Editable Custom Font (16x16, 1.18 Updated)
description:
An editable custom font, redesigned and re-implemented as a Figma project. Most glyphs are created as components, therefore changes to source glyphs are mirrored across the font.


To use this in your pack, copy this template locally, make your changes, then export all files as PNGs and paste them in assets/minecraft/textures/font.


Feel free to credit me in Figma.
